name: Electric Guitar [3]
description: A guitar with the soul of a demon songstress. The melodies produced by this guitar send shockwaves of electricity through the enemy.
stats: Enables use of level 3 Jupitel Thunder
bonuses: 20% more damage with Long Range Attacks.
Immobilize the target for 2 seconds after using [Arrow Vulcan]; Fails against MvP monsters and in WoE.
[The Apple of Idun] MaxHP Rate + 1% per skill level (10% at level 10). Heals three times as often and twice as much.
[A Whistle] FLEE Rate + 20% and Perfect Dodge Rate + 5%.
[Assassin Cross of Sunset] adds 10% more Wind Magic Damage instead of ASPD.
Add a 10% chance of auto-casting level 10 [Jupitel Thunder] when attacked with short range physical attacks.
Double the duration of [Bard and Dancer Spirits] and remains after death.
